name: IRU'S DAWN
description:
• inminent danger looming over Iru's Solar System!
  • Advance through the planet! Secrets Await

This is an Alpha Version that includes 1 out of 4 areas or biomes. The final version of the game will have not only these other 3 biomes, but also more weapons, music,  lore & story, and abilities!

The game is still in developement, so anything you see here might not be definitive. Please, we would love to hear your feedback!
